title: Rohit Sharma smashes fastest century!
content: Rohit Sharma dazzled fans today with a 35-ball century, the fastest in ODI history.

title: England's middle order collapses
content: England's solid start crumbled as their middle order failed to contribute significantly.

title: Bumrah returns with 5-wicket haul
content: Jasprit Bumrah made a sensational comeback picking 5 wickets in a tight spell.
